tracker.sqlCreateTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS items ( id serial primary key, name character varying (200), task text, created bigint)
tracker.sqlAddItem: INSERT INTO items (name, task, created) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
tracker.sqlUpdateTask: UPDATE items SET task = ? WHERE id = ?
tracker.sqlClearBase: DROP TABLE items; CREATE TABLE items ( id serial primary key, name character varying (200), task text, created bigint)
